name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tabs · Count Tabs and Windows + find tabs with audio

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that helps to count windows and tabs, both in the current window and in all windows.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tab and Window Counter
Chrome extension for counting open tabs and windows.

Features:
· (NEW) Find tabs with audio currently playing
· Counts tabs in current window
· Counts total tabs across all windows
· Counts total open windows
· Displays information in popup or sidebar
· Open source

Code available at: https://github.com/denkasyanov/tabs
